body_html: I think we've limited the number of dimensions to keep binary size down, rather than because it's any more complicated to broadcast on more dimensions. @benoitsteiner, is there some way we could handle higher dimensions in Eigen without another specialization, even if it leads to a slower codepath?
body_text: I think we've limited the number of dimensions to keep binary size down, rather than because it's any more complicated to broadcast on more dimensions. @benoitsteiner, is there some way we could handle higher dimensions in Eigen without another specialization, even if it leads to a slower codepath?
body: I think we've limited the number of dimensions to keep binary size down, rather than because it's any more complicated to broadcast on more dimensions. @benoitsteiner, is there some way we could handle higher dimensions in Eigen without another specialization, even if it leads to a slower codepath?
